entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing early this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 10 March 2023
